title: I have 2 laptop, is there a way to extend my display to another laptop monitor? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t as the HDMI port in most laptops work only as output and not as an input. So you’ll be able to extend from one laptop, but won’t be able to receive it on the other laptop. But projecting wirelessly from one screen to another is possible. But lag and latency due to various factors will make working a little hard, but yes, you can watch videos and do some low intensity work.

Yes, grab a hdmi cable. Connect to both the laptops. Assuming you’re using windows 10, click the display button on your keyboard on in settings and choose to receive from hdmi. You’re done. Please upvote if helpful. Select how you want to output on your other laptop
